description: The driver of a lorry also involved in the accident near Duxford on Monday afternoon is not injured.
title: Van driver is seriously hurt in M11 crash
title_page: Van driver is seriously hurt in M11 crash near Duxford - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been taken to hospital with serious injuries following a crash on the M11.
It happened on the northbound carriageway near Duxford, Cambridgeshire, at about 17:00 GMT on Monday.
The driver of a white Renault Trafic van in his 40s was taken to Addenbrooke's Hospital after the accident, which also involved a white lorry.
A Cambridgeshire Police spokesperson said the lorry driver was not injured.
